articles.description: The stars haven’t seen each other in years, Matthew Perry secretly battled anxiety attacks on set, and sparks flew between two cast members
articles.content: Series creator David Crane revealed that the actor suffered a catastrophic injury while shooting the episode The One Where Nobodys Ready. While Joey and Chandler are fighting over who gets to sit in … [+1628 chars]
